# Tutorials

Learn to use AB with practical, real-world examples.

## AI & Machine Learning

### [AI Agent Memory](ai_agent_memory.md)
Build a memory system for AI agents that:
- Remembers conversation history
- Retrieves relevant context
- Learns from interactions

### [Image Recall](image_recall.md)
Store and retrieve images using:
- Binary buffer storage
- Metadata-based search
- Visual similarity grouping

## Knowledge Management

### [Knowledge Graph](knowledge_graph.md)
Build a connected knowledge base:
- Create entities and relationships
- Traverse connections
- Find related concepts

## Code Examples

Each tutorial includes:

✅ Complete working code
✅ Step-by-step explanations
✅ Real-world use cases
✅ Debugging tips

## Prerequisites

Before starting, make sure you understand:

1. [Moments & Cards](../concepts/moments_cards.md) - Basic data model
2. [Buffers](../concepts/buffers.md) - How data is stored
3. [Memory Physics](../concepts/memory_physics.md) - Strength and decay
